repos_data.description: WebTau (web test automation) is a testing API, command line tool and a framework to write unit, integration and end-to-end tests. Test across REST-API, WebSocket, GraphQL, Browser, Database, CLI and Business Logic with a consistent set of matchers and concepts. REPL mode speeds-up tests development. Rich reporting cuts down investigation time.
Identifies and prioritizes God Classes and Highly Coupled classes in Java codebases you should refactor first.
JOB, make your short-term command as a long-term job. 将命令行规划成任务的工具
